#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>
using namespace std;
struct S
{
	int a,b;
	
}obj[100001];

bool cmp( S obj1 ,S obj2 )
{
	if(obj1.b<obj2.b)
		return 1;
	else
		 return 0;
}

int main()
{
 
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		{
			scanf("%d%d",&obj[i].a,&obj[i].b);
			
		}
		sort(obj,obj+n,cmp);
		int count=0,size=n;
		int min=obj[0].b;
		int i=0;
		while(1)
		{
			if(obj[i].a<=min)
				count++;
			else 
			{
				// cout<<count<<" "<<size<<endl;
				size=size-count+1;
				// cout<<count<<" "<<size<<endl;
			
				count=1;
				min=obj[i].b;
			}
			i++;
			// cout<<count;
			if(i>n-1)
				break;
		}
		printf("%d\n",size-count+1);

	}
    return 0;
}
